cab.content: PROP OS:C A B I NET. CREATION OF A KINGDOM OF IRELAND.henorandun by the Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs.I am greatly concerned at Mr. Amery1 s report ofp. his conversation with Mr. 0'Hio:ginsV It leaves me in some (26).doubt as to the impression which Mr. 0'Higgihs may have carried away from it.To me at least it appears that Mr. 0'Higgins1 suggestion runs directly counter to all that was said and done at the Imperial Conference. I regret that the Cabinet was allowed to disperse before they were informed of It, and I hope that both he and Sir Janes Craig may be ini armed, before the matter goes fur-then that it is not a proposal which we can countenance.A.C.foreign Office, S.W.I., ... December 18th, 1926.
